sql_db_url.description: URL to postgres db, including port and database.

default_page_limit.description: The default maximum number of results to return for each listing endpoint.

populate_all_clients.description: At start up, ensure the Token Webapp has clients for all tenants it is configured to serve.

populate_dev_ldap.description: At start up, ensure the test LDAP db is populated with an OU and set of user accounts for the dev tenant.

dev_ldap_url.description: full URL to the test LDAP db.

dev_ldap_port.description: port for the test LDAP db.

dev_ldap_use_ssl.description: Whether to use SSL for the test LDAP db.

dev_ldap_tenants_base_dn.description: Base DN for tenant OUs in the test LDAP db.

dev_ldap_user_dn.description: Base DN for users within the dev tenant in the test LDAP db.

dev_ldap_bind_dn.description: Bind DN for the test LDAP db.

dev_ldap_bind_credential.description: Bind credential for the test LDAP db.

dev_tacc_ldap_bind_credential.description: Bind credential for testing the TACC LDAP db.

dev_token_service.description: full URL to the tokens service to use when use_sk is False.

client_id.description: Base string for the Token Webapp client id's; the full client id for a given tenant will include the tenant id.

client_key.description: Base string for the Token Webapp client secrets.

client_callback.description: URL path for the Token Webapp client callback url

client_display_name.description: The display name used by the Tapis Token Webapp
